trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a designer in a design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 모양 및 느낌 속성 설정을 디자인 타임 환경의 디자이너에 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Designer themes define the look and feel of a designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마는 디자이너의 모양 및 느낌을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 여기에는 디자이너에 정의된 배경 스타일, 전경 스타일, 글꼴 및 아이콘이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom designer theme if you want to provide configuration abilities to properties unique to your designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너에 고유한 속성에 구성 기능을 제공하기 위해 사용자 지정 디자이너 테마를 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a designer theme for a custom designer, the theme from the base class is used.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 디자이너의 디자이너 테마를 지정하지 않을 경우에는 기본 클래스의 테마가 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> that contains the theme information for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to end with when using a color gradient for the background color.
trans-unit.target: 배경색에 색 그라데이션을 사용하는 경우 끝 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The background ending <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> indicates the ending color of a background gradient.

To use background gradient color, set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 배경 그라데이션 색을 사용하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> 및 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> 속성을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The background will gradually change color from the starting color to the ending color.
trans-unit.target: 배경이 시작 색에서 끝 색으로 점차 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets or sets the starting color of the background when using a color gradient on the background.
trans-unit.target: 배경에 색 그라데이션을 사용하는 경우 배경의 시작 색을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The background starting <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> indicates the background color, or the beginning color of a background gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A>은 배경색 또는 배경 그라데이션의 시작 색을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: To use background gradient color, set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 배경 그라데이션 색을 사용하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> 및 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> 속성을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The background will gradually change color from the start color to the end color.
trans-unit.target: 배경이 시작 색에서 끝 색으로 점차 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets or sets the background style.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode" /> that describes the background style.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> to get or set how the background displays color.
trans-unit.target: 배경에 색이 표시되는 방법을 가져오거나 설정하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A>을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> can be set to one of four modes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A>은 다음 네 가지 모드 중 하나로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from upper right to lower left.
trans-unit.target: 오른쪽 위에서 왼쪽 아래로 향하는 그라데이션을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from upper left to lower right.
trans-unit.target: 왼쪽 위에서 오른쪽 아래로 향하는 그라데이션을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from left to right.
Specifies a gradient from top to bottom.

The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets the font for the theme.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> of the theme.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BoldFont%2A> represents the font to use for highlighted text for the theme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BoldFont%2A>은 테마의 강조 표시된 텍스트에 사용할 글꼴을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> for the theme.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> of the theme.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor%2A> is the color used to draw borders for shapes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor%2A>는 도형의 테두리를 그리는 데 사용되는 색상입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets the BorderPen for the theme.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen" /> of the theme.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen%2A> is the pen used to draw borders for shapes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen%2A>은 도형의 테두리를 그리는 데 사용되는 펜입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for the border.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle" /> enumeration that represents the style used for the border.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderStyle%2A> is the style of line to draw for borders of shapes.

The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets the width of the border in pixels.
The width of the border in pixels.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderWidth%2A> is the width in pixels for borders of shapes.
Gets the geometry of the designer.
An enumeration that describes the geometry of the designer.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerGeometry%2A> represents the default geometry of shapes for the theme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerGeometry%2A>은 테마의 도형에 대한 기본 기하 도형을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws shapes with squared corners.
Draws shapes with rounded corners.
Gets the image associated with the designer.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display for the designer.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImage%2A> is the default image to display for the designer.
Gets or sets the image path for the designer.
The image path for the designer.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImagePath%2A> is the path to the image file to use as the default image to display for the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImagePath%2A>는 디자이너에 기본 이미지로 표시하는 데 사용할 이미지 파일의 경로입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관리되는 리소스와 관리되지 않는 리소스를 모두 해제하려면 <see langword="true" />로 설정하고, 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제하려면 <see langword="false" />로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />에서 사용하는 관리되지 않는 리소스를 해제하고, 관리되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing`이 `true`인 경우 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>가 참조하는 관리되는 개체가 보유하고 있는 리소스를 모두 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 참조되는 각 개체의 `Dispose` 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font of the text used by the theme.
The font of the designer theme.
`Font` is used to display text in the designer.
The `Font` property determines the font to use for regular text displayed in the designer.
trans-unit.target: `Font` 속성은 디자이너에 표시되는 일반 텍스트에 사용할 글꼴을 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the foreground.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the theme.
Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ForeColor%2A> property to specify the foreground color of the theme.
The foreground color is usually the color of the text.

The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> 클래스에서 파생한 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>를 만들고 새 테마에 적절한 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> object associated with the theme.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> object associated with the theme.
Assigning this property causes the brush associated with the theme to draw filled lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 할당하면 테마와 연결된 브러시가 채워진 선과 곡선을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> used for painting the foreground of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 테마의 전경을 그리는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is used to paint the foreground of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 테마의 전경을 그리는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is used to draw a line of a specified width and style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>은 지정된 너비와 스타일로 선을 그리는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The line drawn by a `Pen` object can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
trans-unit.target: `Pen` 개체로 그려진 선은 단색, 질감 등과 같은 다양한 채우기 스타일로 채울 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The fill style depends on which brush or texture used as the fill object.
trans-unit.target: 채우기 스타일은 채우기 개체로 사용되는 브러시 또는 질감에 따라 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the location and size of the area on the background.
trans-unit.target: 배경에서 영역의 위치 및 크기를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a brush used to paint the area specified by the rectangle passed.
trans-unit.target: 전달된 사각형으로 지정된 영역을 그리는 데 사용되는 브러시를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that is used to fill interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: 사각형, 타원, 파이, 다각형 및 경로와 같은 그래픽 도형의 내부를 채우는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The background brush is used to fill the interior of the background of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 배경 브러시는 디자이너의 배경 내부를 채우는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the image of the theme.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the image.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ImageSize%2A> is the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the default image used by the theme for the designer.
Initializes the designer theme.
Initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> with the ambient theme.
The property that has changed.
Called to signal changes to ambient settings.
trans-unit.target: 앰비언트 설정에 대한 변경 내용을 알리기 위해 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A> is used to notify the theme to apply changes to ambient properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A>는 앰비언트 속성에 변경 내용을 적용하도록 테마에 알리는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the designer.
The size property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the designer.
